author: Gary Murdock and Pete Taylor
method: Place all the ingredients into a preserving pan and simmer until the turnips have reached a firm, but just-cooked consistency. Transfer to sterilised jars.
ingredients: 120g/4½oz carrots, diced,  1 medium onion, diced,  1 medium turnip, diced,  1 medium courgette, diced,  1 medium cucumber, seeds removed, diced,  3 garlic cloves, sliced,  150g/5½oz dark brown sugar,  salt,  30ml/1fl oz lemon juice,  180ml/6fl oz malt vinegar,  1 tsp ground allspice,  ½ tsp cayenne pepper
